## TEMPLATE_PATTERN

All articles follow the standard help center HTML template:
- Split Lease main header with navigation
- Breadcrumb navigation (All Collections > For Hosts > Article)
- Article content with info boxes, tables, and structured headings
- Sidebar navigation for related articles
- Feedback section
- Shared CSS: `/help-center-articles/css/style.css`
- Shared JS: `/help-center-articles/js/split-lease-nav.js`
